attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To force out anti-social behaviour on the streets make sure holigans are too tired to be anti-social. At the age of 16 you have choices to make:
1: Go into full time education - No under 18's on the street after 9pm
2: 2 years National Service.
This petition will hopefully make the Government and local councils think about making the streets safe for the law abiding people of this country. Realise its a bit drastic but the debate has to start somewhere

rejection.details: Please replace the main sentence "Christopher Fletcher" with a clear action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
